mapper.insert: insert into account values(#{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, to_date(#{birthday},'yyyymmdd'), #{gender}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, 1, sysdate)
mapper.select: select id from account where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select count(*) from account where id=#{userid}
select * from (select rownum rn, n.* from notice n) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select rownum rn, n.* from notice n) where notice_num=#{num}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_num=#{notice_num}
mapper.select: select name, id, password, email, phone, to_char(birthday, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as birthday, gender, zipcode, address1, address2, grade, signup_date from account where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update account set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, birthday=to_date(#{birthday}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), zipcode=#{zipcode}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} where id=#{id}
